segments.text: I can’t believe how oblivious the woman is to everything happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, the kids are being sneaky, and she’s just drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be in for a big shock when she finally turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really taking a risk up there on that stool, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the kids will get away with it or if they’ll get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, and it’s so cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is a moment that’s both funny and stressful at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making such a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman notices before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a perfect example of how kids will do anything for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR
